historical_summary: Xavier has been working at a tech startup in NYC, focusing on blockchain and Web3 technologies. He has utilized AI Coding Assistants for streamlining development processes. His latest project involved integrating blockchain-based digital identity solutions into their product.

Xavier has been exploring New York's dating scene, attending various tech meetups and social events. He's shared stories of his adventures on Twitter, including a memorable night at a blockchain conference after-party.
Xavier keeps his family updated via video calls, sharing stories of his tech job and city life. He's mentioned the growing interest in blockchain within his family.
Xavier has been expanding his professional network through LinkedIn, Twitter, and local tech events. He's been vocal about the potential of blockchain in reshaping industries.
Xavier has expressed thoughts on the future of AI in software development, particularly how AI Coding Assistants are transforming the industry.
Xavier has begun to monitor the $XVI cryptocurrency more closely, noticing its mysterious link to his life events. He's shared some observations on Twitter.
